glsa.title: Logwatch: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Logwatch might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Logwatch analyzes and reports on system logs.

description.p: logwatch.pl does not properly sanitize log filenames against shell metacharacters before passing them to the "system()" function.

impact.p: A remote attacker could pass a specially crafted log filename to Logwatch, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with root privileges or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Logwatch users should upgrade to the latest version:
